nodes.text: The Bespin Wing Guard was the formal law enforcement agency of Cloud City, a mining colony floating in the atmosphere of the planet Bespin. Its members dressed in dark blue uniforms with red and gold trim, and dark blue helmets. They wielded Relby K-23 blaster pistols. During the Iron Blockade of the Anoat sector, the Ivax Syndicate sought to procure one of the Wing Guards' cloud cars, and a young smuggler assisted them in doing so.
